src:
MAXstream Rilis Konten Original, Telkomsel Saingi Netflix?
01 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Agus Tri Haryanto - detikInet


Ilustrasi Netflix. (Foto: Getty Images)

Jakarta - Journal of Terror: Afterlife jadi konten original series terbaru yang dihadirkan MAXstream. Apakah ini pertanda Telkomsel mulai menyaingi Netflix?Seperti diketahui, Netflix yang merupakan platform video on demand gemar menghadirkan konten original di layanan mereka. Dan hal itu mulai diadopsi oleh Telkomsel melalui MAXstream.Terkait hal tersebut, General Manager Video Telkomsel Luthfi C. Wibisono angka suara usai dirilisnya Journal of Terror: Afterlife di Telkomsel Smart Office, Jakarta, Kamis (31/10/2019) menepisnya."Enggak melawan (Netflix), kita berteman kok," ucapnya.Untuk tahun ini, Telkomsel sudah menghadirkan konten original series yang di antaranya Nawangsih karya Melly Goeslaw, Negeri 5 Menara dan Cerita Dokter Cinta yang bergenre komedi romantis, Brata dengan cerita penuh aksi di dalamnya, Critical Eleven yang mengangkat kisah drama, dan Pulang Pulang Ganteng yang bergenre komedi, terbaru Journal of Terror: Afterlife."Nanti ada dua lagi (original series) yang beda genre (bukan horor). Kemungkinan yang bulan depan ini akan ada teknologi di dalamnya, lokal film yang pakai teknologi," ungkap Luthfi. Tercatat hingga sekarang, sudah ada sekitar 20 juta yang mengunduh aplikasi MAXstream. Dengan adanya sejumlah konten original series ini, Telkomsel mengharapkan ada penambahan jumlah unduhan aplikasinya sampai lima juta."Niat kita memang untuk menambah pilihan buat pengguna MAXstream aja dengan banyak film di dalamnya, menambah film lokal, menghidupkan industri lokal, ya semua akan mengarah ke sana," pungkasnya.

text:
MAXstream Releases Original Content, Telkomsel Compete with Netflix?
01 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Agus Tri Haryanto - detikInet


Netflix illustration. (Photo: Getty Images)

Jakarta - Journal of Terror: Afterlife becomes the latest original series content presented by MAXstream. Is this a sign that Telkomsel is starting to compete with Netflix? As is known, Netflix which is a video on demand platform likes to present original content on their services. And it began to be adopted by Telkomsel via MAXstream. Related to this, Telkomsel Video General Manager Lutfi C. Wibisono said the number of votes after the release of the Journal of Terror: Afterlife at Telkomsel Smart Office, Jakarta, Thursday (10/31/2019) brushed it off. against (Netflix), we are friends, "he said. For this year, Telkomsel has presented original content series including Nawangsih by Melly Goeslaw, Negeri 5 Menara and the Story of Doctor of Love with romantic comedy genre, Brata with action-packed stories in it, Critical Eleven who picked up the drama story, and Pulang Pulang handsome comedy genre, the latest Journal of Terror: Afterlife. "Later there will be two more (original series) of different genres (not horror). It is likely that next month there will be technology in it, local films that use technology, "said Lutfi. Until now, there have been around 20 million who have downloaded the MAXstream application. With this number of original content series, Telkomsel expects an increase in the number of download applications to five million. "Our intention is to add choices for MAXstream users with lots of movies in them, add local films, turn on the local industry, so everything will lead to it. , "he concluded.




Check out the video "Netflix Will Act On Illegal Accounts That Are Sold"
